game.name: OMSI 2: Steam Edition
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Off to the next round! Experience a new omnibus simulator with OMSI 2 and start discovering Spandau while driving the omnibus. OMSI 2 is the successor of the well-known and awarded omnibus simulator "OMSI - The Bus Simulator".
game.shortDescriptionEn: Off to the next round! Experience a new omnibus simulator with OMSI 2 and start discovering Spandau while driving the omnibus. OMSI 2 is the successor of the well-known and awarded omnibus simulator "OMSI - The Bus Simulator".

reviewHighlights.text: 한국버스 모드를 다운 받아서 하니 좋네요 G923 레이싱 휠 안될줄 알았는데 G923 정상 작동합니다 여러분들도 한번 게임 다운해보세요.
